title: Coinzino Casino
author: Coinzino Casino
created_time: October 06, 2022, 08:30:26 AMLast edit: October 07, 2022, 10:13:50 AM by Coinzino Casino
content: CoinZino is a Crypto Casino, with all the major game providers, and all the major coins, and a really simple goal. To make the player experience fair and simple in everything we do!We will make Crypto Casino Fast Fun and Fair! Because we are enthusiasts of gaming and crypto and want to share this product with you guys, who are also the same!We are looking for your feedback, so please feel free to write to us, and also if you would like to earn money with us and join our journey then you can sign up to our Affiliate program!Good luck and best regards from us all at CoinZino!https://coinzino.io

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: First of welcome to the forum.Secondly you should have mentioned more details in the OP, like what major games are available, which major currency you can accept etc.Also is there any restrictions regarding player’s country? Please mention that also.What’s the max bet limit? Or in short what’s the bankroll of the site.As a new site, these questions arise on my mind while checking or playing a new site, so please if you don’t mind then free feel to clear my doubts.

comments.author: Coinzino Casino
comments.body: Hi NrcewkerIt's always great to receive feedback from experienced members of the community! So thanks! We also want to engage with early adopters of our brand and help shape the future together!You can join here: https://coinzino.io/en/playnow/registerWe accept BTC, USDT, ETH Litecoin, Binance coin, USD coinYou can also use your fiat card to purchase crypto and convert to whatever coin you want as wellWe have standard game provider limits. All the major game providers are on our site, such as Evolution and Pragmatic Play for Live Dealer games, and then the major slots providers like NetEnt and Red Tiger and Pragmatic Play. These are subject to IP restrictions depending upon where you are located. However most regions are openWe do accept players from the USA and some other regions. The latest info can be found in the terms. https://coinzino.io/en/info/termsWe agree with you that new casinos always face scrutiny and have trust issues. We just encourage players to try us - even for a small amount, and we believe our service and fast payouts will show our players that we are a brand with strong values and a consistent attitude to all our players!We welcome any feedback!Please try us today:https://coinzino.io/en/playnow/registerKind regardsThe Coinzino Team

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Welcome aboard on Bitcointalk. We hope you enjoy your stay here and promote your site well as other casinos.I like the site's design, and the background color, white and blue, gives a new experience seeing the new casino have that color. I see that you plan to add software for iPhone and Android, while I also see an app installation to integrate with the browser. Perhaps, by giving an app to the gamblers, it will ease playing gambling on your site without visiting the site and accessing their dashboard.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Your casino domain already exists for 6 months I would like to know if are you going to get a license for your casino since you are asking for KYC and you claimed to be compliant what kind of license are you going to get, so far you've done the right thing of getting a copper account but the design still needs a lot of improvement, I'm sure you are aware of signature campaign, I don't recommend it this early if you don't have the budget for this, but getting more active and addressing issues will gain the trust of the community.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Welcome to the forum!I checked your terms and conditions, I find you have a rule about mandatory KYC. What's the reason you have such rule when your casino didn't even have gambling license? The reason why casinos have mandatory KYC rule is due to license, while casinos without license are have option to not have mandatory KYC rule.However I see you have a lot providers and games that I've not played before, I might interested to create a new account on your casino if there's a good promotion.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on October 06, 2022, 12:00:22 PMYour casino domain already exists for 6 months I would like to know if are you going to get a license for your casino since you are asking for KYC and you claimed to be compliant what kind of license are you going to get, so far you've done the right thing of getting a copper account but the design still needs a lot of improvement, I'm sure you are aware of signature campaign, I don't recommend it this early if you don't have the budget for this, but getting more active and addressing issues will gain the trust of the community.Asking KYC without a license means they are not registered to conduct such thing. I will definitely hesitate to provide KYC if there’s no legal proof that they are eligible for conducting that part. I believe there ToS is prepared for there upcoming license but definitely not on this current state.@coinzino, Will you mind explained this valid point to Bitcointalk community?

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: welcome to the forum, i just created an account and still trying to see the casino games there, maybe i will do a game for a while to test your casino site, is there a free roll promotion or free bet there to test it?I will be back to review your casino site later

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum!@Coinzino Casino are you official team member of this casino or just spreading your ref link here?I like that you have support for Bitcoin Lightning Network with instant deposits and lower fees, but I would like to play games without passing any kyc verification if possible.Quote from: Coinzino Casino on October 06, 2022, 10:10:51 AMWe accept BTC, USDT, ETH Litecoin, Binance coin, USD coinI don't see information about this supported coins anywhere on main page, only for Lightning Network.Maybe you should add more info about that in page bottom.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on October 07, 2022, 12:47:55 AMI saw that there was an apple logo at the bottom of your website. It turns out that gamblers can play through an application on an Iphone device, do you also plan to make it available via the Android app?Quote10.7. Maximum win per 24-hour period, including all casino games, bonus games, features and free spins, in any bet level in online slot machines, excluding global progressive jackpots won from online jackpot slot machines, is cryptocurrency to the value of €25,000.10.8. Maximum pay-out from any sports bet, including single, multiple and combination bets, is cryptocurrency to the value of €10,000. SourceWhy, there is a winning limit for players for 24 hours?It is a bit strange term obviously, perhaps it is the first time I hear a casino has a winning limit for players based on a time frame. Most other casinos may have a limit on how much to withdraw in daily basis or per 24 hours, but max winning is just non senses for me. The terms can be reasonable if players win the amount in an in-house game but it is not reasonable if the players win it in 3rd party games. I wonder how if someone win lets say €50,000 on 3rd party game? Where the other €25,000 go while basically it should be for player, will the casino take the other €25,000 and give the €25,000 for players or players will get the other €25,000 in the next day?

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Welcome  Coinzino to bitcointalk , yes I can see that you are not mandatory asking for KYC for direct crypto user , but is this also applicable from deposit and withdrawals?Love the title Fast , Fun and Fair , that is 3 F's that gamblers truly seek mostly , but of course having a great support will also bring you more popularity and advantage towards competition in luring more players so better stick with that and extend your advertising by providing at least some events to attract players.

Players who use card deposits may be required to provide KYC documents to the card processor.
